title: Is Pradeep the best book for chemistry for class 11 and 12? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can say that!! But there are many more books which are equally good as Dinesh publication companion chemistry whose language is easy to understand…. Coming back to your question Pradeep hi a good book you can get a variety of questions both conceptual n numericals but the Language is a little bit tough but not a big issue..you may proceed through it but don't forget to check your ncert book as ncert for chemistry is most important.. Hope it helps!!!

I would not say it is the best book but it is definitely worth reading for in depth understanding of the subject especially for class 11 and 12 where concepts play a crucial role. Books like McGraw Hill or Dinesh Publications are also very good even though I personally recommend McGraw Hill. It is precise and does not have unnecessary information that a student of class 11,12 needs to know. You can get a lot of books for chemistry on MyPustak which delivers free second hand books for a minimal delivery fee.
